original_title: ソープランドに売られた人妻 麻美ゆま
overview: Yuma was forced to work at soapland because her husband's debt was burnt. I told myself that everything was to repay and to regain my home, and I was still trying to break my mind, but my body responded to sex after a long absence. Meanwhile, a subordinate of my husband who I knew for a long time came to the store ... A story of a beautiful married woman who drowns between guilt and pleasure.
title: Married Woman Sold To A Soapland
